Our Story: How We Came To Be
Speaker: Rev. Preston Graham
Description: In this first episode - Pastor Graham - walks us through the history of our church here in New Haven, we hear the story of its formation, its early years and struggles, and ultimately how its growth fits into the greater picture of the reformed Presbyterian tradition.

Title: Our Identity: What the Church is by Nature
Speaker: Rev. Preston Graham
Description:
In this episode, Pastor Graham explores a question you might be wondering “why should I participate in church at all? Why go to a building anyway? With a congregation?  “why not just have fellowship with my friends at Starbucks?” His answers help us understand and reframe the importance of the church in relation to the body of Christ.


In this exploration Preston further highlights classical Eastern and Western arguments in regards to the question of Christ as Word versus Christ as Temple, and by the way, what does it really mean that the word became flesh and dwelt among us? Find out with us here.

Title: Our Mission: Christ's Commissions to the Church & Our Strategy
Speaker: Rev. Preston Graham
Description:
In this episode, Pastor Graham unravels the mission of the church and how it correlates with the evangelical role introduced by Christ’s great commission.


Preston further highlights the three defining vocations of church. Here he breaks down the specifics of each of the five marks of a Total Christ spirituality. Preston further tackles questions such as “Can anyone baptize anyone in the church?” and “What does that Presence of Christ look like in church today?”

Title: Our Family Tree & Presbyterianism
Speaker: Rev. Preston Graham
Description: In this episode, Pastor Graham explores the lineage of the church’s family tree and what exactly does it means to be Presbyterian, this includes a look at the logic behind its traditions, and the evolution of Presbyterian governance throughout the centuries.

Title: Is Membership Biblical?, Five Vows of Membership, Our Ministry MAP, & Process for Joining
Speaker: Rev. Preston Graham
Description: In this episode, Pastor Graham examines the question of whether or not church membership is even biblical? With an explanation of the five vows of membership. Preston also covers our organizational structure here at CPC New Haven, our mission and outreach opportunities, and clarifies the specific process of becoming a member.
